updateMessage: New features and critical bug fixes!
fallbackMessage: No streams available. Please try again later.

sections.title: New Features
items: Progress saving - Continue watching from where you left off (pstream accounts)
External subtitle support - Load subtitles from external sources
Embedded subtitle support - Play videos with built-in subtitles
Info button in player - View episode details and show information while watching

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed audio continuing to play after exiting player
Audio now properly stops when app is closed or player is dismissed
